author: CBR
description:
Ever wonder who lit the spark for Jim Zub? He opens up about the "proto nerd," late-night D&D, and why making the table laugh made him want to tell stories.

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 4.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/rTl1KaQGa08
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg

#JimZub #Comics #DND #HeroesJourney
